name: possessed
content:
possessed adjective
(OWNING)
be possessed of something formal
Add to word list
Add to word list
to own something or have something as a quality: He was possessed of a large fortune, but sadly no brains to speak of.
See more
possessed adjective
(CONTROL)
[ after verb ] Someone who is possessed is thought to be controlled by an evil spirit.
